commit.message:
fstream.h (ifstream::ifstream): Add ios::in to mode.

	* fstream.h (ifstream::ifstream): Add ios::in to mode.
	(ifstream::open): Likewise.
	(ofstream::ofstream): Add ios::out to mode.
	(ofstream::open): Likewise.

From-SVN: r31666

files.patch:

+	(ifstream::open): Likewise.
+	(ofstream::ofstream): Add ios::out to mode.
+	(ofstream::open): Likewise.
+
